tags.name: simple-button-grid
tags.description:
`simple-toolbar`
a customizable toolbar

### Styling

`<simple-toolbar>` provides following custom properties and mixins
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--simple-toolbar-border-color | default border color | transparent
--simple-toolbar-border-width | default border width | 1px
--simple-toolbar-group-border-color | border color for button groups | --simple-toolbar-border-color
--simple-toolbar-group-border-width | border width for button groups | --simple-toolbar-border-width
--simple-toolbar-group-padding | padding for button groups | 0 3px

Events:

  * `shortcut-key-pressed` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `columns` {`number`} - 

  * `rows` {`number`} - 

  * `disable-autogrow` {`boolean`} - 

  * `always-expanded` {`boolean`} - always expanded so more button is unnecessary?

  * `aria-controls` {`string`} - id of element controlled by toolbar

  * `aria-label` {`string`} - label for the toolbar

  * `id` {`string`} - unique id

  * `more-shortcuts` - Optional space-separated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `collapsed` {`boolean`} - is toolbar collapsed?

  * `collapse-disabled` {`boolean`} - whether there is no need to collapse

  * `config` {`any[]`} - Custom configuration of toolbar groups and buttons.
(See default value for example using default configuration.)

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar is hovered

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should toolbar stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `shortcut-keys` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

Properties:

  * `columns` {`number`} - 

  * `rows` {`number`} - 

  * `disableAutogrow` {`boolean`} - 

  * `gridStyles` {`string`} - 

  * `alwaysExpanded` {`boolean`} - always expanded so more button is unnecessary?

  * `ariaControls` {`string`} - id of element controlled by toolbar

  * `ariaLabel` {`string`} - label for the toolbar

  * `id` {`string`} - unique id

  * `moreShortcuts` - Optional space-separated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `buttons` {`any[]`} - array of rendered buttons

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - does toolbar have focus

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - is mouseover toolbar

  * `moreButton` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - more button's template

  * `toolbarTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - toolbar element's template

  * `firstItem` - gets first main menu item

  * `nextItem` - gets next main menu item

  * `previousItem` - gets next main menu item

  * `lastItem` - gets last main menu item

  * `mainItems` {`any[]`} - gets main menu items

  * `keyCode` {`{ TAB: number; ENTER: number; ESC: number; SPACE: number; PAGEUP: number; PAGEDOWN: number; END: number; HOME: number; LEFT: number; UP: number; RIGHT: number; DOWN: number; }`} - key codes by key

  * `windowControllers` - 

  * `collapsed` {`boolean`} - is toolbar collapsed?

  * `collapseDisabled` {`boolean`} - whether there is no need to collapse

  * `config` {`any[]`} - Custom configuration of toolbar groups and buttons.
(See default value for example using default configuration.)

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar is hovered

  * `alignVertical` {`string`} - 

  * `alignHorizontal` {`string`} - 

  * `icon` {`string`} - 

  * `label` {`string`} - 

  * `toggledLabel` {`string`} - 

  * `iconPosition` {`string`} - 

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - 

  * `shortcut` {`string`} - 

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should toolbar stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `shortcutKeys` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `_handleResize` -

tags.name: simple-toolbar-button-group
tags.description:
`simple-toolbar-button-group`
a button for rich text editor (custom buttons can extend this)

Events:

  * `selection-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when selection update, so that parent radio group can listen for it.

Attributes:

  * `required` {`boolean`} - 

  * `itemData` {`any[]`} - 

  * `selection` {`string`} - 

Properties:

  * `required` {`boolean`} - 

  * `itemData` {`any[]`} - 

  * `selection` {`string`} - 

  * `selectedIndex` {`number`} - index of selected item

  * `__observer` - mutation observer for tabs

  * `__allowNull` {`boolean`} - allows no item to be selected

  * `__query` {`string`} - query selector for slotted children, can be overridden

  * `__selected` {`string`} - attribute to apply to selected item, can be overridden

  * `__selectEvent` {`string`} - name of event that selects item, can be overridden

attributes.description: `selection-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when selection update, so that parent radio group can listen for it.

tags.description:
`simple-toolbar-button`
a button for rich text editor (custom buttons can extend this)

### Styling

`<simple-toolbar-button>` provides following custom properties and mixins
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--simple-toolbar-button-height | button height | 24px
--simple-toolbar-button-flex | flex for button in a toolbar | 0 0 auto
--simple-toolbar-button-min-width | button min-width | --simple-toolbar-button-height
--simple-toolbar-button-padding | button padding | 0
--simple-toolbar-button-opacity | button opacity | 1
--simple-toolbar-button-color | button text color | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-bg | button background color | transparent
--simple-toolbar-button-border-color | button border color | --simple-toolbar-border-color
--simple-toolbar-button-border-width | button border width | --simple-toolbar-border-width
--simple-toolbar-button-border-radius | button border radius | 3px
--simple-toolbar-button-toggled-opacity | button opacity when toggled | 0.8
--simple-toolbar-button-toggled-color | button text color when toggled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-toggled-bg | button background color when toggled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-toggled-border-color | button border color when toggled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-hover-opacity | button opacity when hovered | 0.8
--simple-toolbar-button-hover-color | button text color when hovered | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-hover-bg | button background color when hovered | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-hover-border-color | button border color when hovered | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-disabled-opacity | button opacity when disabled | 0.5
--simple-toolbar-button-disabled-color | button text color when disabled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-disabled-bg | button background color when disabled | unset
--simple-toolbar-button-disabled-border-color | button border color when disabled | unset

Events:

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `button-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} - 

  * `data-pulse` {`string`} - 

Properties:

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `button` - gets button element

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `currentTooltip` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `isToggled` {`number`} - determines if button is toggled

  * `focusableElement` - 

  * `hasLabel` {`boolean`} - is label specified

  * `hasIcon` {`boolean`} - is icon specified

  * `hasTooltip` {`boolean`} - is tooltip specified

  * `labelVisible` {`boolean`} - is visible label is needed or specified

  * `tooltipVisible` - is tooltip needed or specified

  * `iconTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button icon

  * `labelTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button label

  * `tooltipTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button tooltip

  * `buttonInnerTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for inner part of button (label and icon) in order specified

  * `buttonTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for button, based on whether or not the button toggles

  * `iconPosition` {`string`} - 

  * `alignVertical` {`string`} - 

  * `alignHorizontal` {`string`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - 

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - 

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `isCurrentItem` {`boolean`} - 

  * `dataPulse` {`string`} - 

  * `__abortController` -

tags.name: simple-toolbar-field
tags.description:
`simple-toolbar-field`
a more button to toggle collapsed buttons in the rich text editor

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} -

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `hasTooltip` {`boolean`} - is tooltip specified

  * `labelVisible` {`boolean`} - is visible label is needed or specified

  * `tooltipVisible` - is tooltip needed or specified

  * `iconTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button icon

  * `labelTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button label

  * `tooltipTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button tooltip

  * `buttonInnerTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for inner part of button (label and icon) in order specified

  * `buttonTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for button, based on whether or not the button toggles

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

tags.name: simple-toolbar-menu-item
tags.description:
`simple-toolbar-menu`
`An icon / button that has support for multiple options via drop down.`

Events:

  * `add-a11y-menu-button-item` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu item is added to dom

  * `remove-a11y-menu-button-item` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu item is removed from dom

Attributes:

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `href` {`string`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `controls` {`string`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `slot` {`string`} - 

Properties:

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `href` {`string`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `controls` {`string`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `linkTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - renders item as a link

  * `buttonTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - renders item as a button

  * `menuItem` - gets item with role="menuitem"

  * `slot` {`string`} -

tags.description:
Events:

  * `close` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu is closed

  * `open` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu is opened

  * `item-click` {`CustomEvent<Event>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `button-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `currentItem` - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `position-align` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `keep-open-on-click` {`boolean`} - overrides default behavior of closing
menu after an item is clicked

  * `no-open-on-hover` {`boolean`} - disables menu i=opening on hover

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `tooltipDirection` {`string`} - 

  * `currentItem` - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `menuTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for dropdown menu

  * `listItemTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for slotted list items

  * `keyCode` {`{ TAB: number; RETURN: number; ESC: number; SPACE: number; PAGEUP: number; PAGEDOWN: number; END: number; HOME: number; LEFT: number; UP: number; RIGHT: number; DOWN: number; }`} - key code translations as object

  * `firstItem` - gets first menu item

  * `previousItem` - gets previous menu item

  * `nextItem` - gets next menu item

  * `lastItem` - gets last menu item

  * `firstChars` {`any[]`} - gets list of menu item first characters

  * `itemListeners` {`{ click: (event: Event | undefined) => void; focus: (event: Event | undefined) => void; blur: (event: Event | undefined) => void; mouseover: (event: Event | undefined) => void; mouseout: (event: Event | undefined) => void; keydown: (event: Event | undefined) => void; }`} - menuitem event listeners and their handlers

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `positionAlign` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `keepOpenOnClick` {`boolean`} - overrides default behavior of closing
menu after an item is clicked

  * `noOpenOnHover` {`boolean`} - disables menu i=opening on hover

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `button` - gets button element

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `currentTooltip` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `isToggled` {`number`} - determines if button is toggled

  * `focusableElement` - gets focusable button element

  * `hasLabel` {`boolean`} - is label specified

  * `hasIcon` {`boolean`} - is icon specified

  * `hasTooltip` {`boolean`} - is tooltip specified

  * `labelVisible` {`boolean`} - is visible label is needed or specified

  * `tooltipVisible` - is tooltip needed or specified

  * `iconTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button icon

  * `labelTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button label

  * `tooltipTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button tooltip

  * `buttonInnerTemplate` - template for inner part of button (label and icon) in order specified

  * `buttonTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template menu button

  * `iconPosition` {`string`} - 

  * `alignVertical` {`string`} - 

  * `alignHorizontal` {`string`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - 

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

tags.name: simple-toolbar-more-button
tags.description:
`simple-toolbar-more-button`
a more button to toggle collapsed buttons in the rich text editor

Events:

  * `toggle` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `button-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `icon` {`string`} - 

  * `label` {`string`} - 

  * `labelToggled` {`string`} - 

  * `tooltipDirection` {`string`} - 

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `button` - gets button element

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `currentTooltip` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `isToggled` {`number`} - determines if button is toggled

  * `focusableElement` - 

  * `hasLabel` {`boolean`} - is label specified

  * `hasIcon` {`boolean`} - is icon specified

  * `hasTooltip` {`boolean`} - is tooltip specified

  * `labelVisible` {`boolean`} - is visible label is needed or specified

  * `tooltipVisible` - is tooltip needed or specified

  * `iconTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button icon

  * `labelTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button label

  * `tooltipTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1> | ""`} - template for button tooltip

  * `buttonInnerTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for inner part of button (label and icon) in order specified

  * `buttonTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for button, based on whether or not the button toggles

  * `iconPosition` {`string`} - 

  * `alignVertical` {`string`} - 

  * `alignHorizontal` {`string`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - 

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - 

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `isCurrentItem` {`boolean`} -

tags.name: simple-toolbar
tags.description:
`simple-toolbar`
a customizable toolbar

### Styling

`<simple-toolbar>` provides following custom properties and mixins
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--simple-toolbar-border-color | default border color | transparent
--simple-toolbar-border-width | default border width | 1px
--simple-toolbar-group-border-color | border color for button groups | --simple-toolbar-border-color
--simple-toolbar-group-border-width | border width for button groups | --simple-toolbar-border-width
--simple-toolbar-group-padding | padding for button groups | 0 3px

Events:

  * `shortcut-key-pressed` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `always-expanded` {`boolean`} - always expanded so more button is unnecessary?

  * `aria-controls` {`string`} - id of element controlled by toolbar

  * `aria-label` {`string`} - label for the toolbar

  * `id` {`string`} - unique id

  * `more-shortcuts` - Optional space-separated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `collapsed` {`boolean`} - is toolbar collapsed?

  * `collapse-disabled` {`boolean`} - whether there is no need to collapse

  * `config` {`any[]`} - Custom configuration of toolbar groups and buttons.
(See default value for example using default configuration.)

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar is hovered

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should toolbar stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `shortcut-keys` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

Properties:

  * `alwaysExpanded` {`boolean`} - always expanded so more button is unnecessary?

  * `ariaControls` {`string`} - id of element controlled by toolbar

  * `ariaLabel` {`string`} - label for the toolbar

  * `id` {`string`} - unique id

  * `moreShortcuts` - Optional space-separated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `buttons` {`any[]`} - array of rendered buttons

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - does toolbar have focus

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - is mouseover toolbar

  * `moreButton` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - more button's template

  * `toolbarTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - toolbar element's template

  * `firstItem` - gets first main menu item

  * `nextItem` - gets next main menu item

  * `previousItem` - gets next main menu item

  * `lastItem` - gets last main menu item

  * `mainItems` {`any[]`} - gets main menu items

  * `keyCode` {`{ TAB: number; ENTER: number; ESC: number; SPACE: number; PAGEUP: number; PAGEDOWN: number; END: number; HOME: number; LEFT: number; UP: number; RIGHT: number; DOWN: number; }`} - key codes by key

  * `windowControllers` - 

  * `collapsed` {`boolean`} - is toolbar collapsed?

  * `collapseDisabled` {`boolean`} - whether there is no need to collapse

  * `config` {`any[]`} - Custom configuration of toolbar groups and buttons.
(See default value for example using default configuration.)

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar is hovered

  * `alignVertical` {`string`} - 

  * `alignHorizontal` {`string`} - 

  * `icon` {`string`} - 

  * `label` {`string`} - 

  * `toggledLabel` {`string`} - 

  * `iconPosition` {`string`} - 

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - 

  * `shortcut` {`string`} - 

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should toolbar stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `shortcutKeys` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `_handleResize` -
